issue_description:
# Parameter documentation for linear models

The documentation for the `alphas` parameter for `RidgeCV` lacks the default value that is defined in constructor of parent class and may be hard to guess. Also it is said to be a Numpy array, while list/ tuple also can be passed (the default value is a tuple).

Some more linear models also lack default value documentation, e.g. alpha and fit_intercept fo RidgeClassifier, so I can also fix them too.
